lead_paragraph: Four South African cricketers, including former test wicketkeeper Thami Tsolekile, have been handed bans ranging from seven to 12 years for attempting to fix matches, Cricket South Africa (CSA) announced on Monday.

headline.print_headline: South Africa Ban Tsolekile, Three Others for Fixing Attempt
headline.main: South Africa Ban Tsolekile, Three Others for Fixing Attempt

snippet: Four South African cricketers, including former test wicketkeeper Thami Tsolekile, have been handed bans ranging from seven to 12 years for attempting to fix matches, Cricket South Africa (CSA) announced on Monday....
